# nxos_cli (Resource)

This resource is used to send arbitrary CLI commands to NX-OS devices via NX-API JSON-RPC. This should be considered a last resort in case DME objects are not available, as it cannot read the state and therefore cannot reconcile changes.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "nxos_cli" "example" {
  cli = <<-EOT
  interface loopback123
  description configured-via-cli
  EOT
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cli` (String) The CLI commands to send to the device. Multi-line strings are supported, with each line being sent as a separate command.

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
